A Ramen place in Barecelona! When you miss Japan or want to try Japanese food, this is an authentic restaurant to go!The black interior is very sheik and welcoming. Ramen comes out very quick so if your on the go, it is recommended to go here!It's Miso Ramen is very delicious and not only they have ramen, but also have curry  and chashu donburi on it's menu! Definitely recommend to try it if you in the area and love Japanese food.
